item.title: MPW
item.description: score:124 Chances: Things finally looking up for this beaten-down REIT The hospital-focused REIT finally had some good news Medical Properties Trust working to bolster its liquidity Medical Properties Trust is making progress on its plan to get back on solid ground Risks: Buying this stock will probably result in losing your money Its earnings results weren’t promising, but it isn’t dead yet either Score:124 chances characters count - risks characters count = 124
